# Research question


```{r}
data <- read.csv("breast-cancer-wisconsin.data", na.strings="?")
colnames(data) <- c("id", "Clump Thickness", "Cell Size Uniformity", "Cell Shape Uniformity", "Marginal Adhesion",
                    "Single Epithelial Cell Size", "Bare Nuclei", "Bland Chromatin", "Normal Nucleoli", "Mitoses",
                    "Class")
head(data, 10)
summary(data)

cor_data <- cor(data, use = "complete.obs")
cor_data <- as.data.frame(cor_data)
cor_cols <- names(cor_data)[which(cor_data[,0] > 0.1)]
cor_cols 
```
